actions.committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Education Reform.

official_title: To amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to condition receipt of funds under part A of title V of such Act by a State on the State requiring successful completion of courses in American history and American government as a prerequisite to high school graduation, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 (ESEA) to require, as a condition of eligibility to receive funds for innovative programs under ESEA title V part A, a State educational agency or an outlying area to make courses in American history and American government a prerequisite for regular public secondary school graduation.

titles.title: To amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to condition receipt of funds under part A of title V of such Act by a State on the State requiring successful completion of courses in American history and American government as a prerequisite to high school graduation, and for other purposes.
